title: Digital Literacy Enhancement Program for Libraries: Mobile-Based Microlearning

context.additional_context: Science academic materials utilization education conducted in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment.

learning_goals: Learners can apply academic database search strategies with 80% accuracy through 5-minute mobile modules
Learners achieve a 100% correct answer rate three consecutive times on interactive quizzes provided through the mobile platform to master reference citation rules
Learners can present three or more criteria for evaluating information credibility in mobile forum discussions with peer learners after watching a 3-minute video tutorial

resources: Science domain academic DB sample dataset
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
